CustomField.description: The number of soft credits attributed to this Contact that closed in the last N days. The value of N is set in NPSP Settings | Donations | Donor Statistics.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The number of soft credits attributed to this Contact that closed in the last N days. The value of N is set in NPSP Settings | Donations | Donor Statistics.
CustomField.label: Number of Soft Credits Last N Days
